comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This photo is used on the Iowa Legislature's website for its 5 biographical entries on William L. Harding (1877-1934), an Iowa lawyer and politician who served in its House of Representatives from 1906 to 1912, and as its Lieutenant Governor from 1913 until sworn in as Iowa Governor in January, 1917. He left office in 1921 after a scandal-plagued administration. www.legis.iowa.gov/Legislators/legislatorAllYears.aspx?PI... (see the "More Information" links for some primary source materials.) A brief wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_L._Harding
